resources.string: "We hope you have been enjoying following your favorite games and teams with DScore. You can continue enjoying the app for the low price of $4.95/yr. Please tap below to finalize this subscription. \nThanks! \n- The Thexabyte Team"
Please contact us with any questions that you may have at dscore@thexabyte.com

Welcome to DScore. Please tap the button below to start your free 10 days of access. We are sure that you will love the app, and after your 10 days of free access, you can subscribe for a year for just $4.95/yr. Don't worry though. You wont be charged unless you select to subscribe. 
Thanks for Downloading and we hope you love the app as much as we liked making it for you! 
- The Thexabyte Team"
